Author: K-Cli
Name: Bozja Buddy
Description:
Features:
• Info about Lost Actions, Fragments, FATEs/CE e.g. location, drops, marketboard price, fate chains, mettle rewards, exp rewards, etc. There are options to copy the info to clipboard, then paste it on chat.
• Weather forecast.
• Alarms: Time-based, Weather-based, FATE/CE-based.
• Custom loadouts planning, saving, and sharing. Featuring recommended loadouts from ABBA, PEBE, LegoSteppers, CEM, etc.
• Filterable Lost Find Cache overlay. Filter by name, role, fragment, weight, and Custom Loadout in selection.
• Character's Stats and Cache. Customisable alert for actions that are running low.
